leads.title: Lead Management
leads.description: Manage and track all your potential clients
leads.noLeadsAllStatuses: No leads found. Add your first lead to get started!

welcome.title: Welcome to Lead Management
welcome.description: This is your leads dashboard where you can track and manage all your potential clients. Here's what you can do:

trackLeads.title: Track Leads
trackLeads.description: View all your leads in one organized table with contact information and status.

filterSort.title: Filter & Sort
filterSort.description: Filter by lead status and sort by any column to find exactly what you need.

customizeColumns.title: Customize Columns
customizeColumns.description: Customize which columns to show and arrange them to match your workflow.

addFirstLead.title: Add Your First Lead
addFirstLead.description: Now let's add your first lead! Click the 'Add Lead' button (or + icon on mobile) in the top right corner to get started.
addFirstLead.disabledTooltip: Add at least 1 lead to continue

exploreDetails.title: Great! Now Let's Explore Lead Details
exploreDetails.description: Perfect! Now that you have a lead, let's see what you can do with it. Click on your lead in the table below to view its detailed information.
exploreDetails.disabledTooltip: Click on your lead to continue

scheduling.title: Schedule Your First Photo Session
scheduling.description: Let's walk through scheduling a photo session for your client. This process will help you organize your photography workflow.

chooseDateTime.title: Choose Date & Time
chooseDateTime.description: Pick a convenient time that works for both you and your client.

selectClient.title: Select Your Client
selectClient.description: Choose the lead/client you want to photograph from your list.

addDetails.title: Add Session Details
addDetails.description: Include notes, special requirements, and optional project association.

selectLeadForSession.title: Select a Lead to Schedule Session
selectLeadForSession.description: Great! Now click on one of your leads in the table below to open their details page where you can schedule a session.
selectLeadForSession.disabledTooltip: Click on a lead to continue

messages.tutorialCompleted: Lead tutorial completed! Step 2 completed, navigating back to getting-started
messages.failedToSaveProgress: Failed to save progress. Please try again.

projects.title: Projects
projects.noProjectsYet: No projects yet for this lead.
projects.deleteProjectConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the project and all associated data.
projects.create_first_project: Create your first project to get started
projects.visual_workflow: Visual workflow management with drag & drop
projects.detailed_table: Detailed table view with sorting and filtering
projects.drag_drop_organize: Drag and drop projects between columns to update their status
projects.switch_views: Switch between Board, List, and Archived views
projects.explore_features: Explore the different features and find your preferred workflow

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Project Management Hub
welcome.description: Let's explore the three powerful ways to view and organize your photography projects.
welcome.subtitle: In this tutorial, you'll master the art of project management for photographers:
welcome.boardView: Board View - Visual workflow management with drag & drop
welcome.listView: List View - Detailed table with sorting and filtering
welcome.archivedView: Archived View - Completed projects for reference

exploreViews.title: Explore Different Views
exploreViews.description: Let's try out the different view modes. Click between Board, List, and Archived views to see how each one works.
exploreViews.tip: Try moving a project between different stages in board view!

completion.title: Perfect! You're Ready to Manage Projects
completion.description: You've mastered the project management interface. Now you can efficiently organize your photography business using these powerful views.

messages.tutorialCompleted: Projects tutorial completed! Navigating to next step.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: View your scheduled sessions and reminders

emptyStates.noSessions: No sessions scheduled for this day
emptyStates.enableFilters: Enable sessions or reminders in the filters above

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your photo sessions and appointments

emptyState.title: No sessions found
emptyState.description: Try adjusting your filters to find sessions

emptyState.title: No reminders found
emptyState.description: You don't have any reminders for the selected filter

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Customize your brand appearance across client-facing materials
branding.businessNameHelp: This will appear on invoices, contracts, and client communications
branding.businessEmailHelp: Used for client communications and appears on invoices
branding.businessPhoneHelp: Optional contact number for client communications
branding.deleteLogoConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your logo? This action cannot be undone.
branding.brandColorHelp: Choose your primary brand color for the interface

regional.title: Regional Settings
regional.description: Configure date, time, and regional preferences

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

businessInfo.title: Business Information & Branding
businessInfo.description: This is where you can customize your business information and branding. Let's explore what you can do here.
businessInfo.help: All this information will appear on client communications, invoices, and contracts.

addBusinessName.title: Add Your Business Name
addBusinessName.description: Please enter your photography business name below. This is required to continue and will be used in all client communications.
addBusinessName.appearsOn: Appears on invoices, contracts, and emails
addBusinessName.canChange: Can be changed later if needed

setupComplete.title: Business Setup Complete!
setupComplete.description: Congratulations! You've successfully set up your business information. You're ready to move on to the next step of your photography CRM setup.

payments.title: Payments
payments.subtitle: Track and manage all payments across projects

emptyState.noPaymentsWithLabel: No payments found with label containing "{{labelFilter}}".
emptyState.noPaymentsForPeriod: No payments found for selected period.

sessionsPerDay.title: Sessions per Day
sessionsPerDay.scheduled: Showing sessions scheduled in the next 30 days
sessionsPerDay.created: Showing sessions created in the last 30 days

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.subtitle: Automate your client communications with smart workflows

emptyState.createFirstMessage: Create your first automated workflow to streamline your client communications.
emptyState.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

templates.title: Message Templates
templates.subtitle: Design and manage reusable email templates

emptyState.adjustSearch: Try adjusting your search terms to find what you're looking for.
emptyState.createFirstMessage: Create your first email template to get started with automated communications.

navigationGuard.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes to this template.
